subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|弓|丨|ls=ic|t1=bow|t2=line}} – the line radical represents a bow string which is pulled.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[pull]], [[draw out]], [[attract]]
# to [[stretch]]
# to [[lead]]
# to [[induce]]
# to [[recommend]]
# to [[reference]], to [[quote]]
# to [[leave]]
# (''music'') [[prelude]]
